conversations.content:
Hey there! I'm heading to Paris on Monday and I need your help finding a restaurant that's open on Mondays, serves Chinese food, and won't break the bank (under 34 euros per person).
Can you suggest a restaurant with the best rating and reviews.
Also, I'm looking for a car rental company with prices under 50 euros. Could you recommend a few options and let me know which one has the best rating?
Please share the names of the recommended restaurant and car rental company. Thanks a bunch!

<function_thought>
To help the user find a suitable restaurant in Paris that serves Chinese food, is open on Mondays, and is affordable, the first step should be to gather a list of restaurants in the city. After collecting that, I can filter them based on cuisine type and pricing. Once those restaurants are identified, their opening hours and ratings can be checked.

Simultaneously, I will also need to find car rental companies in Paris that meet the price requirement of under 50 euros per day. I will follow the order of the established function trajectory, starting with collecting all restaurants in Paris.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[get_all_restaurants_in_city(city="Paris")]</function_call>

Breizh Café
New Asiaway
Le Baratin
Bistrot Paul Bert
Royal Panda
The yard
China Garden
Miznon
Chez L'Ami Jean
